Text: You're anonymous, you have no trusted logo or VIP logo next to your name, there's no seeds, no peers, no file info whatsoever and where the file info usually is, you've written "not a fake"... Seems kind of fishy to me.

I thought so too - but when the quality and especially the errors seem exactly like the MP4 version ...

See yesterday's "newsroom" avi (s).

Probably a newbie not wanting to risk being identified.
